replacements.\"Sessions, credentials, logs, and confi: "会话、凭据、日志和配置都存储在那里。"
replacements.\"- Gateway is in remote mode; run docto: "- 网关处于远程模式；请在运行网关的远程主机上执行 doctor。"
replacements.\"- State directory permissions are too: "- 状态目录权限过于开放"
"- 检测到多个状态目录。这可能导致会话历史分散。"
replacements.\"- ${missing.length}/${recent.length} r: "- ${missing.length}/${recent.length} 个最近会话缺少记录文件。请检查是否有删除的会话文件或分散的状态目录。"
replacements.\"- Main session transcript has only ${l: "- 主会话记录只有 ${lineCount} 行。会话历史可能没有正常追加。"
replacements.\"- Tip: back up the workspace in a priv: "- 提示：将工作区备份到私有 git 仓库（GitHub 或 GitLab）。"
replacements.\"- Keep ~/.openclaw out of git; it cont: "- 不要将 ~/.openclaw 提交到 git；它包含凭据和会话历史。"
